overview: Cinelimite presents a video essay by Juliano Gomes and Mariana Nunes, in which they delve into the symbolism of Compasso de Espera: a film conceived by ZÃ³zimo Bulbul and Antunes Filho in response to the lack of opportunities for Black professionals in the film industry in the late 1960s.
tagline: An introduction to Compasso de Espera
title: Black Skin, White Suit
